review_data.title: Beautiful authentic Italian
review_data.content: Beautiful authentic Italian restaurant located inside the 25 hours hotel. Super cool atmosphere & even cooler staff that gave a great tip of trying the homemade lemonade, divine. I had the octopus for starter, pizza for main & tiramisu for desert all were super authentic...More
